website_summaries.verdict: Offers a decent viewing area when working. Multiple designs on outside of helmet are nice.
pros: Performs well in a variety of work conditions
Offers shade adjustment from 9 through 13, as well as 5 through 9 in some modes
Offers a viewing area of 3.86 inches by 2.09 inches, which is larger than most helmets in this price range
Lightweight welding helmet that's good for hobbyists or those with basic welding jobs
cons: May be tough to fit helmet properly

customer_reviews.title: Great for school
customer_reviews.text: I use this model everyday at work. That covers tig, mig, and stick. Very cheap buy for $25. I've bought $225 hoods and I see only one difference. The man on the sticker. Only downfall is the pivot screws. They come loose time to time. This is common in most hoods. Great for school, hobby, or everyday shop use.
customer_reviews.author: Shalynn M

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! The price can not be beat
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! The price can not be beat! I own a Miller 9002x and it cost $400. This does the same job anyday!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Sable

customer_reviews.title: I like the sitting part it have 2 different range that ...
customer_reviews.text: Helmet came exactly as i ordered . I like the sitting part it have 2 different range that go from 5-9 setting and 9-13 . I can set it to # 5 or 6 to use with the plasma cutter where i can see the cutting mark or line. I use the # 9 or 10 when using the welding machine. The sensitivity and delay control sitting work great. Auto darkening work perfect you can set it the way you like it . It solar charge and operate off 2 battery that can be replace.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Do not trust your eyes to the cheap welding helmets!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product should not be sold on Amazon, it is very dangerous. If you are dumb enough to take a chance, like me, you can wind up with some nasty eye damage, like me. This welding helmet will shut off mid weld if there is any increase in brightness of the arc. It will auto darken when you strike an arc, but any variation in the brightness of the arc will cause the auto-darkening to shut off and you'll get a nice corneal burn. I had thought it was batteries, but I changed them a couple times to brand new batteries. DO NOT USE THIS. Do not jeopardize your eyes to save 150 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Ivar Tenes

customer_reviews.title: I used it today for the first time and this shield is as good as the more expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: I work as a frame tech in a body shop welding on panels and decided to try this welding helmet for under fifty bucks.I used it today for the first time and this shield is as good as the more expensive ones...Works great and its fully adjustable....Been using this for sometime now and this Helmet is great ..You can spend a lot more money to get the same results with this one...The head strap is kinda flimsy but it will last if you take care of it...Would buy again if needed..
customer_reviews.author: Len Ricupero

customer_reviews.title: Good Helmet, bad seller Point One Premiums
customer_reviews.text: I received only the helmet, it was missing the headband, extra lenses, and whatever else comes with it. The seller (Point One Premiums Point One Premiums) refused to send me the missing items, leaving me only with the option to return it, and lose out on the sale price I had got it for.
customer_reviews.author: Arif

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Says He Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the welder in my family :). His full time job. He wears this welding shield from 8 am - 6 pm. every day for a bout 1 -2 weeks now. I bought it for him not knowing if I was making a good choice. He was first concerned about how light weight it was, but when he used it , it was so absolutely perfect ( his words), which makes my heart sing! I love when he is happy! Now he is soo grateful that it feels so light on his head. This will now be his first choice in welding shields. This is absolutely the best value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Best welding helmet I ever purchased and half the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Best welding helmet I ever purchased and half the price of the most expensive one I've purchased. Great viewing area. Works as advertised and, unlike other helmets at twice the price, has replaceable batteries. My other two helmets were bought about 4 years ago (at the same time. one from a discount hardware store at $40, the other from a welding store for $115) and the batteries died. This is a replacement and I am ***very*** happy with it. Antra is now my go-to welding helmet outlet!
customer_reviews.author: Poppa Jack

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with the "REVCO - BC5W-BK Armor Cotton Welding Cap" for my sons birthday. He is in Welding in school and loves it. My husband checked these out and look to be in gr8 condition. My son will love the flaming wolves on the side of helmet. Also gr8 that it comes with extra lens. If there are any issues with it, I will update rating once my sons gets this and uses it.
customer_reviews.author: MarQuette Mason

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very clear view. Have a C4 Lens in my Lincoln helmet which cost much more. Not sure I can say either is better than the other, just the color of the tint is different. Head gear leaves much to be desired on this Antra, but I'm not wearing it all day so I can live with it given the price to have a spare here at the house for project so I don't have to bring my Lincoln home each night.
customer_reviews.author: GWrider

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice home garage/workshop helmet
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this one weekend so far andbut I like it. It feels fairly well made for a home garage/workshop, though I don't think it would hold up well in a commercial/industrial setting. The view port is much larger than the Harbor Freight model I have been using for the last few years. I also really like that it allows you to set it up for plasma/torch cutting. My only complaint is the head band runs a little on the small side. I wear a hat size of 7.5 to 7 3/4 and this just barely fits adjusted all the way out to the widest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Feuerborn

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't had flash burn since!!!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my hubby who has been a welder for almost 20 years! Longer than we have been married. He loves it, says it's the best helmet he's ever used. Has not had flash burn at all since he's been using this one. Plus his hands and arms come home looking horrible from the burns. No burns. Plus he said only Helmet he's used that he didn't get f.b. and it's easy to replace the glass shield as your don't have to take apart the entire face shield area just to get it out. Said it comes out easy.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: This is a good basic hood at any price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic hood at any price. Auto turn on is great. It is standing up to heavy abuse as well as the best of them, and wont be to bad on the wallet when it gets squished. Headband stops work well. Well suited for ship fitting and welding by the people that actually do the work. Not sure about the "Experts" probably wont be good enough for them :)
customer_reviews.author: Larrykh465

customer_reviews.title: Excellent helmet, low price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent helmet for the price, $50. New in April, 2016. Full range of shading for welding and cutting - 4 to 13. Sensitivity is good. Works fine in or out of sunlight. Headband is good. Helmet material "High Impact Polyamide Nylon" is strong and light. I wish the shade range adjustment knob were on the outside, but for that you pay more. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: H Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep working
customer_reviews.text: It stopped coming on a little over a year later right after the warranty period expired. I know I didn't pay a lot for it but I would have expected it to last longer than it did even for that price. To a lot of people that may not have been a lot of money either but when you're on a disability income every dime counts. And I feel like I wasted my money as hard as it is to come by for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Brown

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Obviously it isn't the the best quality, but it does everything you need and it's one of the cheapest auto-darkening helmets you can buy. If you're just getting into welding and aren't ready to invest a lot of money on a really nice helmet, I'd highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic entry level welding helmet
customer_reviews.text: A great auto darkening welding helmet for the price! The quality of visibility in both its light and dark modes is very impressive, and the overall build quality is good. The shade adjustment can only be made with the helmet off, but that's a minor nitpick. Other than that, I wish the headgear was a bit more comfortable. Overall, this is a perfect budget friendly welding helmet for the entry level welder or hobbies.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet for the money
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it yesterday and had a chance to use it today. Depending on the environment (indoor/outdoor) you have to play with the settings (sensitivity and delay) a little until you get them set properly. I used shade 11 for MIG welding. Once set, the auto darkening works great. Very fast. Did not get flashed once. Helmet is very light. The headband is average compared to higher end welding helmets. It is comfortable though and seems like it will hold up. The helmet also came with extra plastic lense covers for future replacement so that is nice. Overall I give it 5 stars. It is definitely worth the money and will work for me as a weekend/hobby welder.
customer_reviews.author: mark anthony

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: My first automatic and it works well. Love the idea that the arc light recharges it. It's plastic, so it will melt from splatter. Lightweight which is both good and bad. Handle with care. Fits well on my 7-3/4 head. Comes with extra lens covers that do melt. Flip up drag is bit sensitive to temperature, but adjustable. Reduces need to take hands off work.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. Dims very quickly and I can adjust the darkness. Comes with three replacement front screens and one replacement rear. Yes the plastic is not rigid, but you’re not playing football in it... after using this I wouldn’t drop $300 on a high end model. I wouldn’t even drop $75 for something slightly nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I wish it did because it looks cool. So if you have a smaller or more ...
customer_reviews.text: Wayyyy too small for my head had sparks land in my ears sometimes but didn't feel right on the face. I wish it did because it looks cool. So if you have a smaller or more slender face go for it. Average guys its going to be snug. Bigger guys nope won't fit.
customer_reviews.author: The Chemist

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: For the price I cant complain. Performs quick and reliably with my 120V Clarke Flux Core welder. Clarity is not as good as my passive blue tinted glass. Fits my melon head good (7 7/8") but I cant wear a think welding cap under it, I also have long hair so this should fit anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Voltonsteinner

customer_reviews.title: Works great, super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this for a while before I left a review. I have no complaints. It's comfortable, it is easy to adjust, it comes with spare sheilds and it does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Antra AH7
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice helmet for the money. Am a little concerned about the head gear as it seems cheap, but has held up so far with no problems. Darkening has worked very well. So far I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Fadely

customer_reviews.title: I weld professionally and this is the best bang for your buck auto darkening helmet
customer_reviews.text: I weld professionally and this is the best bang for your buck auto darkening helmet. I weld with guy's that have spent hundreds on a helmet and even they think this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Mims

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Great features for a great price. Used it with factory settings and worked well. Even used the grinder mode. No flashing my eyes like my old one did occasionally. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: I got it for FCAW. It’s light and quick to darken and equally quick to lighten back up once the welding has stopped. I got one of those welder’s beanies to protect the back of my neck and ears. Winning combo! I can recommend this hood without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Denfire621

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable option
customer_reviews.text: I like that the knobs are on the inside of the hood. This helps when bumping into things with the hood. It gives better control of not blinding yourself with shade options. I also like the grinding mode on this hood. It makes it easier than switching from welding hood to a grinding shield every time you want to grind something. For the price point I am pleasantly surprised at how well this lens on the hood performs. I would buy another one again if ever in a pinch and needed an affordable option. It was delivered on time as promised and I have no complaints or issues.
customer_reviews.author: erica d norton

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a better helmet than what was sold at harbor freight and it cost a fair amount less too. So far I have been satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Henry

customer_reviews.title: I can see!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask because my old mask couldn't go any lighter than shade 9. Now I can see clearly and do my tig welding easily. I was surprised by how low the price was for the featutes on this helmet. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for the cheapest helmet that still has all of the features that matter.
customer_reviews.author: bluemoose

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat it. Works well. Not as heavy duty as my Lincoln, but I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my welding class and to use at work. Works really good. I don't weld everyday so i don't know how it holds up but works really good for the use i put it thru.
customer_reviews.author: Norbert D.

customer_reviews.title: VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Works good, Bought my first welder and did not want to dump tons of cash into a hobby I might not pursue. This helmet was inexpensive and as an added bonus I used it watching the eclipse! If you are an experienced welder you might want bells and whistles but for me this should work great
customer_reviews.author: Jay M.

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to huge name brands!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Got a a different one from my Matco Tools guy aroundbthevsame time for a couple hundred bucks more and they are dang near the same performance! Love it for the price! Would absolutely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. He doesn't weld alot but it has worked great for when he has used it. Great deal and amazing quality for the price. Delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna M Qualls

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: works great for Plasma cutting, grinding feature, MIG, flux wire, and stick welding. Came with extra lens, fits snug and easy to adjust Good price, changeable battery Better quality than Harbor Freight
customer_reviews.author: ChrisC

customer_reviews.title: OK ... BUT ....
customer_reviews.text: The feature that allows you to test the battery before using did not work. I will strike an arc without looking through the lens and see if it is working. Not serious enough to send it back but it SHOULD work.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Varney

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet. The 4 sensors really reduce the times ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice helmet. The 4 sensors really reduce the times I have been flashed welding on machinery. Nice and light to wear. The dual ranges make it work for plasma cutting as well.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Works great. My first Welding Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Welding Helmet. Great feature that it has is that you can test the helmet to see if it works first by pressing the battery button inside the helmet while holding it infront of a light.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Good Mask
customer_reviews.text: Overall the helmet is good quality, good adjustability. Not sure if there is a problem with mine but even on full darkness it doesn't seem to be dark enough, usually leaves me with the typical dark spot in the middle of my vision after a long weld.
customer_reviews.author: thebman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mask. Lightweight, comfortable, and responsive.
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing that I don't like about this product. It's light, comfortable, and effective. This one seemed to have more features than others at its price point, such as larger viewing window, number of sensors, extra clear viewer shields, etc.
customer_reviews.author: JusticeCrusader

customer_reviews.title: It gets annoying after a while
customer_reviews.text: Helmet works well but is hard to keep on your head when lifted up. I have the head band as tight as will fit on my head but every time I lift the helmet up it starts falling off of my head. It gets annoying after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Suprisingly amazing
customer_reviews.text: I would like to start off buy saying how amazed I am at the performance to price ratio. This helmet works as good or better than 300 dollar miller hoods. It's even lighter, I had to give it 4 stars because I couldn't find a hard hat adapter for it which I needed for work. I Jerry rigged one and make it work. Still an amazing product and am glad I took a chance on it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Zoanni

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I do a small amount of welding daily at work and this helmet is pretty great especially for the price. I love the functions on it, and how lightweight it is.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Worked for three months, cheap crap! NO support from manufacturer on a return tossed in trash
customer_reviews.author: Robert Turlip

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was most pleased with this product and how well it worked.
customer_reviews.author: SMS

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for the money. The only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars is the swivel adjustment is a bit finicky. Amateur welder so a pro may have a far different opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Fortsbest

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Box Delivered
customer_reviews.text: Would've been nice to get the right helmet in the box instead we got a plain black and gray helmet no design on it no skills no nothing no pictures thanks
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good Helmet for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Good Helmet for the price. I use it at home. I am a welder so this is a backup. But I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Wish I would have bought one years ago. Only downfall is the material it's made of. If you do a lot of welding, I would spend the extra money for a more superior quality. This works great for the little welding I do.
customer_reviews.author: FrankieB

customer_reviews.title: For the price it works great
customer_reviews.text: I'm an ex-industrial tech and for the price I was skeptical, but they work on the projects I have done so far, about 30 hours of welding.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Needed a helmet instead of goggles for my torch to avoid getting molten steel on my face. This helmet does the trick. It has the right settings for torch cutting with oxy/act.
customer_reviews.author: RobbyB

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: This ADF helmet works extremely well! It has great features and you can't be it for the money!
customer_reviews.author: MrG

customer_reviews.title: Cheap headgear ruins a good helmet
customer_reviews.text: I find this is a wonderful working helmet. But no matter how much I tighten the head straps it keeps dropping down until the helmet comes in contact with my nose.
customer_reviews.author: rjj3307

customer_reviews.title: i love this helmet and at $50 cant beat the price
customer_reviews.text: tried one out.ending buying 5 more .keep one in each truck and 2 at the shop.love this helmet
customer_reviews.author: william faw

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Have had no issues works for what I need. I only weld as a hobby and out of necessaty once or twice a month.
customer_reviews.author: Tbsolem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for looking at the sun with, if you're into that sort of thing. ^_^
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mitchum

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for me. My welding improved now that I can see.
customer_reviews.author: Larry A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: but It works just as good as my $300 Miller good
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap, but It works just as good as my $300 Miller good , it’s a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: grasslmj383

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price, and extra lens covers.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I ever bought a regular helmet when you can get an auto darkening one for this price. Like it better than others because it came with extra lens covers which aren't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: The Doctor

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly well, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this regularly now for months. No complaints. The black plastic that makes up the bulk of the mask is somewhat softer and more pliable than my others, but in this case I don't really think that it means it is any less durable overall.
customer_reviews.author: VeeVee

customer_reviews.title: husband loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my husband and he absolutely loved it! It's great quality has many adjustments to fit the we're perfectly, and a very reasonable price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: So far it's held up well
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need it to do. Love the grinding mode, but don't forget to switch it when you pop over to welding! So far it's held up well and the controls are great.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Helmet
customer_reviews.text: These helmets have came down in price since I first bought mine and people say you get what you pay for well I wish other stuff I buy was this cheap and this good like the product a lot! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works well no flash-burn yet. replaced my 400$ miller that stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Top_Kek

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: Already put to use with mig job. This mask works so much better than the ones I had. Plenty of controls and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pahabrin

customer_reviews.title: Works great. I don't write many reviews
customer_reviews.text: I'm a complete welding novice, so take this for what it's worth. For the price, I don't think this can be beat. Works great. I don't write many reviews, but once in awhile you get something that works so great for the price. This is one of those items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: All adjustments are inside hood. Works really well for my uses.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and it works great, no problems so far
customer_reviews.text: Affordable and it works great, no problems so far... I’ve had it for about two months and use it every week
customer_reviews.author: Chris Daniel Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as high dollar masks.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for production, 2 months. So far so good. The shade works just as miller or better. It's light weight and comfortable. My only issue is some of the arc splatter gets behind the front lens cover. Causing damage to the lens. So far about 10 splatter have gotten to the solar panel and lens.
customer_reviews.author: Leo morano

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son. All his friends wanted to use it. The instructor was also impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: At that money, this mask works very well. ...
customer_reviews.text: At that money, this mask works very well. Make sure you know how to adjust this mask properly to your kind of welder.
customer_reviews.author: Bangnhan87

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I'm an amateur at best learning how to TIG weld on a miller syncrowave 250. This hood does an amazing job. Easily competes with $400 miller hoods
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works great for welding and grinding. Sensitivity levels are precise for welding.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Van Wagenen

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: a bit to get use to and adjust the settings
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works well
customer_reviews.text: it works very well. for the price .... amazing. The little switch to toggle between wilding and grinding is small, but still doable
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Very clear and lots of adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, grind/weld modes, shades 5-13, great sensitivity and response timing. I would give the comfortability rating 3.5/5 Great hood for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Robichaud

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome. Easy to set up and use. Works well. So far i'm not blind so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good helment works as good as my moore expensive helment .
customer_reviews.author: Richard r. McMullen

customer_reviews.title: Good starter helmet for tech school
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just started welding classes and is loving this as a starter helmet. It's lightweight, comfortable, and easy for her to see through.
customer_reviews.author: farmandteach

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: The window is bigger than most and the adjustability is great. The headgear works fine. Best inexpensive helmet so far.
customer_reviews.author: Wackezoid

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Good helmet. I'm no professional by any means but it does everything I want it to. I would recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome And work pretty good after I put new batteries ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome And work pretty good after I put new batteries in it. Headgear was flimsy but used old headgear I had easy to swap. Auto dark works well haven’t tried grind feature.
customer_reviews.author: Trayven

customer_reviews.title: Worth it ,
customer_reviews.text: Definitely love it , not sure if it’s me or it’s the lack of instructions for the helmet but doing sick MIG and TIG welding it’s annoying to have to keep changing settings , including when I want to plasma cut
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Cool Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is beautiful. My hubby was really happy with it. Smoothe transaction arrived very quickly,
customer_reviews.author: WonderMommie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit cheaply made but for the price the mask works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: lwolf

customer_reviews.title: overall good
customer_reviews.text: does a great job... does have a slightly awkward fit compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Stopped auto darkening properly about 2 months after purchase and daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet. Works great
customer_reviews.text: Good helmet. Works great. It's a little rough when folding up and down but for the price I would buy another one if needed
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: works great. I had a huntsman I used for work
customer_reviews.text: works great. I had a huntsman I used for work. this work the same . great value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Robert Beswick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Good helmet, I gave it four stars because sometimes I get hot metal in my helmet if I'm at any angle other than looking straight at the weld.
customer_reviews.author: Jai Cribillero

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for the price. Good adjustment range and field of view.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mears

customer_reviews.title: Good shield
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for work. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cissy Womack

customer_reviews.title: Inside lens is a poor design. You have to take the whole auto ...
customer_reviews.text: Inside lens is a poor design. You have to take the whole auto darkening unit out because the magnifier clips are in the way. While trying to remove the lens one of the retainer clips on the bottom broke. Now lens will not stay in place. This helmet has spent more time in operable then in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not right helmet
customer_reviews.text: Does this really look like the picture? Expecting an Eagle now plain helmet. This is a gift. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good helmet. Once the sensitivity settings are set, it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: WS2006

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! Dims and comes back very fast. Love it! I can actually see where I'm welding now! haha!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!!!! It’s cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money you pay for it. After a month of daily use I had to replace the batteries. It is now defective in that it will no longer shade between 9-13 and it can not be returned or exchanged.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Inkland

customer_reviews.title: Works good for me
customer_reviews.text: It works great, the best part is the ability to attach a magnifier lens.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brillinger

product_meta.title: Antra AH7-360-7312 Auto Darkening Welding Helmet, Variable Shade 4/5-9/9-13, Great for TIG, MIG/MAG, MMA, Plasma, Grinding, Solar-Lithium Dual Power, 6+1 Extra Lens Covers
feature_bullets: 【Safety & Protection】Passive Filter with Permanent shade 13 to UV/IR, combined with double-layered auto dimming LCD shutter, providing sufficient and accurate shade range within 4/5-9/9-13 to visible lights; Full face neck coverage protecting welders from spatters and harmful radiant; Meets ANSI Z87.1 Standards

【Comfort & Convenience】Very light total weight, reduces head and neck stress; Fully automatic auto darkening lens, eliminating flipping up and down the hood; Easy and simple internal settings, minimizes accidental changes and also great for tight space applications

【Performance】4 Premium redundant arc sensors, with highly responsive detecting and controlling units providing super-fast switching time and accurate auto shading, minimizing harmful radiant bypass, avoiding eye stress

【Reliability】Interference Suppression Technologies, minimizing false triggering: less sensitive to sun lights, workshop lights while very responsive to welding arc, even the hardest to detect DC TIG: Rating > 2 Amps

【Versatility】A great personal protection equipment that can handle multiple processes of Plasma cutting, abrasive wheel cutting/grinding, DC TIG, AC TIG, MIG/MAG, MMA/Stick welding, which are popular in metal fabrication industry, welding schools, welding shops, auto manufacturing and repair industry, ship factories as well as DIY hobbyists projects

specifications.Included Components: 1X AH7-360-7312, 6 Ext. Lens cover, 1 Int. Lens cover, User's Manual
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars433 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
